subject: Preakness Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Alcoholic Beverages
Mascots
lead_paragraph: In an attempt to bring crowds of young people back to the Preakness, the Maryland Jockey Club has named Kegasus — a half a beer-bellied man, half a horse — Lord of the Infieldfest.
snippet: In an attempt to bring crowds of young people back to the Preakness, the Maryland Jockey Club has named Kegasus — a half a beer-bellied man, half a horse — Lord of the Infieldfest.
